Text: Please leave comments to let me know how you like it.  it's my first time uploading!
Well done! But you should maybe put the book list on the post, but no biggie. Thanks...

WOW this brings me back! really great upload man! 

Thanks!
Thanks alot man. I hope you update with the new FR books in the future :)
Thank you so very much for this. I won't have a chance to check them out until I get my Kindle in May, but I do look forward to reading the ones I can't buy any more.

Totally awesome collection. Thanks a lot.
I just hope you can complete the whole collection.
hey just so you guys know you can download kindle for your pc free! but will these work for it?

Great Collection my friend! I had quite a few of these myself when they came out in paperback. Used to collect them for nearly a decade till water damage took em out, and mold got the rest after. This torrent made my day. Much Thanks!!! You can also read these on your comp with YBook Reader. A nice little bit of freeware with a simple UI
actuallty, after further searching Mobipocket Reader is a much better program then the YBook for pdf/mobi files

This is so great! Thank SO much for this, I have been wanting to read so many of the books, but they're out of print mostly! Now I can read all these classics on my kindle while commuting to work! Again: Thank you SO much, you're effort is REALLY appreciated here!
WOW! This is one heckuva first upload. Thank you very much.
